works.description:
Dear Google Staff,
Please consider the following things.
i) Spam website(faizanulquran.com has copied our copyrighted printed material from (equraninstitute.com). The ebook version of our printed book has been offered free for our website visitors but the spam website has copied our content and has uploaded it to their website.Unfortunately, Google has given our page ranking to the spam website. Even now, the source code of the spam website contains the following line.

<!-- Mirrored from www.equraninstitute.com/qaida.html by HTTrack Website Copier/3.x [XR&CO'2010], Tue, 20 Mar 2012 06:01:52 GMT -->

Which shows that our website was download on 20th March 2012 using HTTrack software.We had round about 15,000 - 20000 potential visitors on this page. Please check your records and ban this spam website and restore our previous original page. Specified pages are below.

Thanks
